Subjective: Sore throat for 3 days; fever this morning; cough last week; unbearable pain when swallowing; took paracetamol and ibuprofen; concerned about abscess; impact on daily life: unable to play tennis due to fatigue; no smoking/alcohol; Request: Wants antibiotics.
Objective: Vitals: Temp 38.3°C; Sat 98%; PE: Ears: normal; Throat: median uvula; slightly red pharyngeal arch; enlarged tonsils; little slough on both sides; no abscess; Lungs: vesicular breath sounds; no additional sounds.
Assessment: Viral pharyngitis; no signs of abscess or bacterial infection.
Plan: • Continue paracetamol 4x/day and ibuprofen 3x/day as needed; • Drink plenty of fluids; • Cold drinks/popsicles for pain relief; • Safety net: contact us if symptoms worsen, shortness of breath, or difficulty swallowing; • Follow-up: not scheduled.
